author: Simon Difford
description: Whether or not Mat was a rat, we shall never know. However, the drink that's named after him is long and thirst quenching.
name: Mat the Rat
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with lemonade, lightly stir and serve with straws
